alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Montgomery; Pike (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:08PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pike, northwestern Bullock and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shopton, or 12 miles northeast of Meadville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Union Springs, Pine Level, Shopton, Franklin Field, China Grove, Sedgefield, Mitchell, Currys, Simsville, High Ridge and Orion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
